TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CryptoConfig extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi CryptoConfig extends System.Object

span.span: Accesses the cryptography configuration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了此类识别的简单名称以及它们映射到的默认算法实现。The following table shows the simple names recognized by this class and the default algorithm implementations to which they map. 另外，还可以将其他实现映射到这些名称，如 [将算法名称映射到加密类](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes)中所述。Alternatively, you can map other implementations to these names, as described in [Mapping Algorithm Names to Cryptography Classes](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes). |简单名称Simple name|算法实现Algorithm implementation| |-----------------|------------------------------| |3DES、三重 DES、TripleDES、TripleDES3DES, Triple DES, TripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES|| |AES、AesCryptoServiceProvider。AES, System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider|| |AesManaged （AesManaged）AesManaged, System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged|| |System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm|| |DES、System.web. DESDES, System.Security.Cryptography.DES|| |DSA、System.web。DSA, System.Security.Cryptography.DSA|| |ECDH、ECDiffieHellman、ECDiffieHellmanCng、ECDiffieHellmanCngECDH, ECDiffieHellman, ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng|| |ECDsa、ECDsaCng、ECDsaCngECDsa, ECDsaCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng|| |System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm|| |HMAC、System.web. HMACHMAC, System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC|| |HMACMD5 （HMACMD5）HMACMD5, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACMD5|| |HMACRIPEMD160 （HMACRIPEMD160）HMACRIPEMD160, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACRIPEMD160|| |HMACSHA1 （HMACSHA1）HMACSHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1|| |HMACSHA256 （HMACSHA256）HMACSHA256, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256|| |HMACSHA384 （HMACSHA384）HMACSHA384, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA384|| |HMACSHA512 （HMACSHA512）HMACSHA512, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512|| |System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm|| |MACTripleDES （MACTripleDES）MACTripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.MACTripleDES|| |MD5、System.web. MD5MD5, System.Security.Cryptography.MD5|| |System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.MD5Cng|| |RandomNumberGeneratorRandomNumberGenerator|| |RC2、System.web. RC2RC2, System.Security.Cryptography.RC2|| |Rijndael （Rijndael）Rijndael, System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael|| |RIPEMD160、RIPEMD-160、RIPEMD160ManagedRIPEMD160, RIPEMD-160, System.Security.Cryptography.RIPEMD160Managed|| |RSA、System.web. RSARSA, System.Security.Cryptography.RSA|| |SHA、SHA1、System.webSHA, SHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA1Cng|| |SHA256、SHA-256、SHA256, SHA-256, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA256Cng|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256CryptoServiceProviderSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA256CryptoServiceProvider|| |SHA384、SHA-384、SHA384SHA384, SHA-384, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA384|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA384CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA384Cng|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA384CryptoServiceProviderSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA384CryptoServiceProvider|| |SHA512、SHA-512、SHA512SHA512, SHA-512, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA512|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA512CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA512Cng|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA512CryptoServiceProviderSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA512CryptoServiceProvider|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm|| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的成员 。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig/VB/members.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将一组名称添加到要用于当前应用程序域的算法映射。

span.span: Adds a set of names to algorithm mappings to be used for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的映射优先于内置映射和 machine.config 文件中的映射。The specified mappings take precedence over the built-in mappings and the mappings in the machine.config file. 这些映射用于防止部分信任的代码使用受信任的加密操作。The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.

summary.span: 指示运行时是否应强制实施该策略，以便仅创建经美国联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 认证的算法。

span.span: Indicates whether the runtime should enforce the policy to create only Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) certified algorithms.

value.span: 若强制实施该策略，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to enforce the policy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `false` 为，则可以创建任何算法。If `false`, any algorithm may be created.
